name: Sacred Transformation Bracelet
description:
The lava beads within this bracelet represent a connection to earth.  It also symbolizes the beauty and spirituality found within the Hawaiian Islands and how it all began with a rock.

The blessed rudraksha beads will encourage deep meditation, tranquility and good health.

Width: 7.25"
Materials: Gold vermeil, pure silver, brass

name: With Every Beat of My Heart Bracelet
description:
“Your task is not to seek for love, but merely to seek and find all the barriers within yourself that you have built against it.” Jalal ad-Din Rumi

Garnet is the stone of love and compassion. Create positive change in your life and the lives of those around you by spreading energies of love and light with every beat of your heart.

Width: 6" of semiprecious gemstones  
Materials: Leather tie measures 6"
Metals: Gold vermeil, brass

name: Maya Dagger Necklace
description:
One is unable to break through without seeing through māyā  माया, the sanskrit term for illusion. 

The triple blade of the phurpa, or "magic dagger" symbolizes the overcoming or cutting through  the three root poisons: ignorance, desire, and hatred. It also also represents control over past, present and future. 


Length: 20" 
Metals: Gunmetal over brass; Tibetan silver dorje

name: Satvva Bracelet
description:
In Sanskrit sattvah  सत्त्व means "truth".

Find your higher Self by speaking and living your own truth.  Turquoise is a master healing stone that can strengthen your entire body.

Width: 7.25"
Metals: Gold plated over brass

name: Golden Ganesha Charm Necklace
description:
Ganesha charm paired with Tourmaline 

Ganesha is the god of success in new ventures and overcoming obstacles. Elephants are also a symbol of good luck, loyalty and friendship. Keep your mini Ganesha close to your heart as you venture throughout your journey.


> 22k gold fill chain measures 16"
> mini tourmaline gemstone (assorted colors of purple, green, pink, brown)
> Gold dipped Ganesha charm (10mm)
